results.title: Ingress (2013)
results.brief_description: Ingress (or Ingress Prime) is an augmented reality (AR) mobile game developed and published by Niantic for Android and iOS devices.

constellations_other.name: Location and exploration
constellations_other.description: A comparative look at location-based gaming and street art and how the way we experience these two art forms has moved out of traditional spaces and onto the street.

results.description: Welcome to the world of Ingress, Agent. The discovery of XM, a mysterious resource of unknown origin, has sparked a covert struggle between two distinct Factions.
description_for_label: Welcome to the world of Ingress, Agent. The discovery of XM, a mysterious resource of unknown origin, has sparked a covert struggle between two distinct Factions.

results.title: Ingredients of an effective speech
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Speaking with confidence”.
‘Ingredients of a speech’ addresses speaking rate, volume, voice projection, use of light and shade and the use of pausing for delivering an effective speech.

results.title: Ingmar Bergman
results.creator_credit: Svenska filminstitutet, Stattan Hedqvist and Stig Bjorkman
results.brief_description: Ingmar Bergman is widely acknowledged by film critics as adopting an intellectual stance towards film making, as well as being one of the great directors of actors. This documentary includes clips from his films and indicates his working relationships with actors. The film also brings out the requirements involved in being a film director. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Infinite journey
results.brief_description: Man’s historical aspiration to reach the moon and the world’s involvement in the Apollo 11 flight are the themes of this film, which are placed in the context of the historical aspiration and scientific genius of many lands which made them possible. Also focuses on the Gemini flights. Introduced by Richard Nixon and narrated by Gregory Peck.

results.title: Infield play at 1st and 3rd
results.creator_credit: American and National Leagues of Professional Baseball Clubs
results.brief_description: Instructional film for intending infield players at first and third base. Some very fine slow-motion footage reveals that wealth of delicate grace otherwise latent in baseball’s gymnastic protocols.

results.title: Infertility and adoption
results.creator_credit: Margaret Nicol, Tony Vuletich and V and A Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Understanding maternal grief”.
Infertility is perhaps the most unacknowledged and painful grief in our society - truly the death of a dream. While addressing major psychological issues encountered by infertile women, this programme also discuuses the option of medical intervention by outlining the benefits, the additional stress it can cause and the impact on relationships.

results.title: Infertility
results.brief_description: Introduced by Professor Carl Wood, this program looks at the various causes of infertility in humans. The documentary is presented in a simple manner and is designed to give basic information to couples who are having trouble conceiving. The sequel is titled, “The Alternatives to Infertility”.
